Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Music is a wonderful thing. It's a salve for
a weary, long-traveled soul.<sp:0:4:0>When I was hiding from those monsters
in Gerudo Canyon, I felt like I'd never be
able to relax again.<sp:0:4:0>But thanks to you, here I am. And thanks
to this music, I feel at ease.<sp:5:1:0> I'm so
grateful for all of it.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Gah! Rain, now?<sp:5:1:0> Careful you don't get
completely soaked!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Relaxing here, listening to music... It's all
so soothing.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let me get a little closer to the troupe,
then we can chat.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> you're the one who saved us back at
Gerudo Canyon!<sp:0:4:0>It's been a while. <sp:5:0:0>How have you been?<sp:0:4:0>Us? Well, after the whole incident, we all
decided to go our separate ways for now.<sp:0:4:0>It's been stressful. <sp:5:0:0>I keep worrying I'll be
attacked by monsters I can't handle on
my own again.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>But this music is really helping wash all
that stress away.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>I was just enjoying the music when down
came the rain. Unbelievable.
